data.title: Medtronic on LinkedIn: #medtroniccanada #careersthatchangelives #descarrieresquichangentdesvies
data.meta_description: A heartfelt Thank You to the patients who participated in our annual Holiday Program at Medtronic Canada this week. Their generosity in sharing how health…
data.text:
¡Conoce la historia de Maria Mercedes D'leman! Maria, Clinical Specialist Manager, nos comparte su historia a lo largo de 15 años dentro de Medtronic, cómo ha sido el proceso de los cambios de rol dentro de la compañía, los retos que ha implicado atreverse a dar esos saltos y el apoyo que ha recibido de parte de sus líderes y compañeros para lograr sus objetivos. Tener claro cuál es nuestro plan de carrera es un punto clave para continuar un gran desarrollo personal y profesional. ¡Descubre por qué Medtronic se trata de un crecimiento constante y no solamente de un trabajo! Conoce nuestras vacantes: https://lnkd.in/ghaz2Jm4 #CarrerasQueCambianVidas #Liderazgo #MedtronicLATAM

At Medtronic, Inclusion, diversity, and equity play a critical role in bringing more creativity, better decision-making, and enhanced innovation to our work. Rodney Pereira, Senior Director, Medtronic Asia shares his perspective on the importance of Inclusion, diversity, and equity at work. #inclusion #diversity #equity #culture

We believe equity starts beyond the workplace and our pledge to contribute to a more equitable, healthier world is stronger than ever. That's why we're committed to addressing systemic inequities both inside and outside of our business in order to drive sustainable impact. Take a look at progress we made in 2023: https://lnkd.in/esACbq8r #MedtronicImpact

Chatbots and #AI assistants only scratch the surface of what #ArtificalIntelligence can do. Join experts from the medical, education, and tech industries as they explore what AI has in store for the future. Watch The Futurist: https://lnkd.in/gxYmRJgv

We surveyed Americans on their thoughts about the future of #AI in healthcare, and the results show that consumers have confidence in its potential. Here's what they had to say: https://lnkd.in/esajpnKF
